channel.title: CloudRun on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in CloudRun on Memo Tut

item.title: Realize microservices easily with Cloud Run × Flask
item.description: #Introduction I am making an application by personal development, but I was making the back end with rails. One day. .. .. I saw this article. App development without backend engineer with Firebase, benefits and challenges experienced by Cookpad Firebase enables development without the need for backend engineers (゚Д゚) … Magicka I was inspired by this and made a backend with Cloud Function. But For some reason it quit.
